<<<<<<< HEAD
A mournfull elegie, in pious and perpetuall memory of the most honourable, Robert, Earle of Essex and Evve, Viscount Hereford, Lord Ferrers of Chartley, Bourchier, and Lovaine, late Lord chiefe Generall of all the Parliaments forces, who exchanged his life Septemb. 14. 1646. J. B.
[2], 6 p.
printed for Thomas Banks, London : 1646.
Signed at end: J.B. In verse. Reproduction of original in the Glasgow University Library.
=======
A mournfull elegie, in pious and perpetuall memory of the most honourable, Robert, Earle of Essex and Evve, Viscount Hereford, Lord Ferrers of Chartley, Bourchier, and Lovaine, late Lord chiefe Generall of all the Parliaments forces, who exchanged his life Septemb. 14. 1646. J. B.
[2], 6 p.
printed for Thomas Banks, London : 1646.
Signed at end: J.B. In verse. Reproduction of original in the Glasgow University Library.
Thomas Banks
